gohai.simpletweet - package gohai.simpletweet
 

S

setOAuthAccessToken(String) - Method in class gohai.simpletweet.SimpleTweet
Set the OAuth Access Token This is necessary to do before the Twitter API can be used To get this key it is necessary to register your application at https://apps.twitter.com/app/new
setOAuthAccessTokenSecret(String) - Method in class gohai.simpletweet.SimpleTweet
Set the OAuth Access Token Secret This is necessary to do before the Twitter API can be used To get this key it is necessary to register your application at https://apps.twitter.com/app/new
setOAuthConsumerKey(String) - Method in class gohai.simpletweet.SimpleTweet
Set the OAuth Consumer Key This is necessary to do before the Twitter API can be used To get this key it is necessary to register your application at https://apps.twitter.com/app/new
setOAuthConsumerSecret(String) - Method in class gohai.simpletweet.SimpleTweet
Set the OAuth Consumer Secret This is necessary to do before the Twitter API can be used To get this key it is necessary to register your application at https://apps.twitter.com/app/new
SimpleTweet - Class in gohai.simpletweet
Class for allowing easy access to the Twitter API via twitter4j
